question: The last couple of weeks I notice some cog problems, and now my right eyelid is not working right, moves a bit, stops, moves more, droops more than the left. A little different from the blepspasms (sp?). I'm a little concerned. Is i more likely parkinson's or something else? I am only taking 3mg requip 3X day.I'm 56 fe, also have rhumatoid arthritis and diabetes II.Thanks for your help.
title: new sx my Parkinson's?
